name: Manas
description: The great hero who united the Kyrgyz tribes.

name: Bakai
description: The wise mentor and advisor of Manas.

name: Kanykei
description: The loyal and brave wife of Manas.

name: Almambet
description: A strong and courageous ally of Manas, a loyal friend.

name: Koketei
description: Father of Manas, a respected elder.
